name: Pool Covers
description: Premium Japanese anodized aluminum pool covers. Protect and enhance your pool area year-round; waterproof, debris protection, Japanese quality. Manufactured by Sankyo-Tateyama.
descriptionLong: Anodized aluminum pool cover systems from KunkelWorks/Sankyo-Tateyama. Waterproof and debris protection; resilient to humidity, salt, and sun. Same meticulous fabrication and quality control as carports and patio covers.
sizes: Custom to pool dimensions; specify for quote
priceNote: Pricing by size and options; email requirements for quote.
attribution: Product info from KunkelWorks (kunkelworks.com). For details and pricing: info@kunkelworks.com.
